definition: circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)

sentences.english: The most wonderful is Opus 18th the "Great Brilliant Waltz".
sentences.chinese: 最棒的是作品18号，“大华丽圆舞曲”。

sentences.english: Tales from Vienna Woods is one of strauss's famous waltzes.
sentences.chinese: 《维也纳森林的故事》是斯特劳斯著名圆舞曲之一。

sentences.english: Youth is a play waltzes, half sad affair.
sentences.chinese: 青春是一首奏响的圆舞曲，一半忧伤一半暧昧。

sentences.english: Johann Strauss the younger wrote more than 400 waltzes, ?
sentences.chinese: 小施特劳斯写了400多首圆舞曲，是吗？

sentences.english: Merry and clear shape likes a radiant and graceful waltz in royal palace.
sentences.chinese: 有着欢快明朗的造型，似雍容华贵的宫殿圆舞曲。

sentences.english: Waltz No. 15 in A flat minor, Op. 39
sentences.chinese: 降a小调圆舞曲，第十五号，作品39。

sentences.english: Geschichten aus dem Wienerwald (Tales from the Vienna Woods), waltz, Op. 325
sentences.chinese: 维也纳森林的故事，圆舞曲，作品325。

sentences.english: 'Tales from Vienna Woods'is one of Strauss's famous walz.
sentences.chinese: t维也纳森林的故事，是斯特劳斯著名圆舞曲之一。

sentences.english: Tales from Vienna Woods is one of Strauss's famous waltzes.
sentences.chinese: 是斯特劳斯著名圆舞曲之一。

sentences.english: Round Midnight is a staple for the late night jazz radio stations.
sentences.chinese: 《午夜圆舞曲》是晚上爵士乐收音广播站的主打歌曲。

sentences.english: Lash danced a fine line. He wanted speed and invisibility.
sentences.chinese: 拉稀选择了一个圆舞曲似的航线，他想要速度和隐蔽。

sentences.english: I'm hopeless how to indite a waltz.
sentences.chinese: 创作圆舞曲我是一窍不通。

sentences.english: The band thumped out a merry German waltz.
sentences.chinese: 乐队响亮地奏出一支欢快的德国圆舞曲。
